Text.Page: Soldier, I must have your help.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What do you need?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Although we're developing new weapons, the argons aren't just sitting idle.

I want you to kill the shapers controlling their new sarjalod cannons, and bring me back a component from one of those cannons. We must learn their weaknesses.

That was no mean feat, . Well done.

With those shapers dead, the cannons will sit silent for a while, and give me time to analyze its design.

The shapers never venture out without minions to protect them.

And watch out for those cannons. There's no telling what will set them off.
